dc:title: Life And Death
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Reports on hearing Senator Robert Kennedy was shot but still alive. Recalls the assassinations of Martin Luther King and President Kennedy. Prays the Jesus prayer.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 886 1968-06-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
